import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "./Header"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import ApiFunctions from "../ApiFunctions"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function CompanyDetails() { const { id } = useParams(); const [details,setDetails] = useState([]); const [jobs,setJobs] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { var data = new FormData(); data.append('org_id', id); ApiFunctions.getSingleOrg(data,{ headers:{ 'content-type':'multipart/form-data' } }).then(response => { setDetails(response.data) setJobs(response.data.data) }).catch(e => { window.alert('Some error occured'); }) },[id]); return (
